Primary Contact: Debra Leverrier, RN, BSN, Program Manager, Western Human Resource Corp.; Phone:  * 1.866.763 6624 ext 104 * 250.864.2080; Email: dleverrier@western.ca
Alternate Contact: Carley Leboldus, RN, BScN, Nursing Services Coordinator, Western Human Resource Corp.; Phone:  * 1.866.763.6624 ext 111 * 250.215.4386; Email: cleboldus@western.ca
Service Details: - Offers two programs providing professional nursing services through individualized care and other person-centered care that supports the individual and their family- Resource Ability provides in-home and in-school nursing support for medically fragile and special needs children- Nursing Solutions provides professional nursing services to all age groups, from babies to seniors
Eligibility: Please call for details on individual program eligibility requirements
How to Apply: - Referral to Resource Ability is through the local health authority, physician’s office, Ministry of Children & Families or private, client-specific contracts- Nursing Solutions does not require referral
